frontmatter.title: Changelogs
frontmatter.meta_title: BeOnboard - complete onboarding template for React Native app
frontmatter.meta_description: React Native currently creates vibrant wave in mobile application development. “Write once, Run anywhere”, then you can effectively produce mobile app across all platforms including iOS & Android by one language with “Native effect”.

markdownRemark.html:
BeOnboard is content 21 high-quality React Native templates, cool animations and the ease of customizing onboarding template. We not only create charming User Interface, excellent User Experience, but also give you control over screen designs and animationss of your apps.

With BeOnBoard, you just need to swipe to create your professional mobile apps with advanced toolkit including lottie animations, parallax and video screen designs, zoom functions, various unique formats like carousel videos and flat circle, gradient effects, blur & card view and card & full image wide formats.

Free Your Demand. The Powerful Swipe!

Reference

  • Download demo via Expo: https://expo.io/@inspireui-demo/beonboard

  • Free demo download: https://snack.expo.io/Sy2nN8CTe

  • Support Ticket: https://github.com/inspireui/support/issues
